A lot of twists and deaths. I feel like: Star Wars was created to be space adventure full of archetypes of good and evil with melodramatic twists. This film's naval-gazing and smug subversion of everything set up in the previous film is both boring and insulting. The illogical behaviour of the characters and the failure of the internal logic of the story's universe make this a deeply frustrating and disappointing watch after the fun of episode VII.
